title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

For Task A, the response must accurately identify the percentage of baby boomers who identified as Independents in 2014.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a trend in the data.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how that trend described in part (B) might affect political campaigns in the future.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how parties should adapt based on the data shown in the line graph.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
